text: <Ðis> <is> <þæra> <land> <boc> <to> <Hamme> <þæ> <Aðelstan> <cing> <gebocade> <Wulfgare> <bisceope> <on> <æce> <yrfe>.
Prædicta siquidem tellus. His terminis. Circumcincta clarescitærast on eastewardan.
On lin leage geat.
And ðonne in lin leage middewearde.
And ðonon suðrihte wið ðara stan ceastla.
And ðonne of ðæm stan ceastlum to pyddes geate.
Ðonon to oswaldes berghe.
Ðonon ondlong herpoðes.
On burghardes anstigo.
Ðonne forð to bares anstigon.
Ðonon on heardanleage middewearde.
Ðonne suð on ge rihte.
Ondlong henna dene.
Oð hit cimeð to ðære dic.
Ðonne west ut ðurh henna leah.
Oð hit cimeð to ðære efese.
Ðonne a norð be wyrtwalan ðæt on efen ðone greatan æsc, ðonne norð ondlong ðæs hlinces.
Ðæt on bofan hangran, ðonne ondlong hagan.
On wifiling falod westeweardne, ðonne norð ofer dune.
On meos hlinc westeweardne, ðonne a dune on ða yfre.
On beowan hammes hecgan.
On bremeles sceagan easteweardne, ðonne on ða blacan græfan.
Ðonne norð be ðem & heafdan.
To ðære scortan dic.
Butan anan æcre, ðonne to fugel mere to ðan wege, ondlong weges.
To ottes forda, ðonon to wudumere, ðonne to ðære ruwan hecgan, ðæt on langan hangran, ðonne on grendles mere, ðonon on dyrnan geat, ðonne eft on lin leage geat.
Þis is þæs landes boc æt hamme.
